trans-unit.source: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: G03·2 | Argothian Enchantress | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
trans-unit.target: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

trans-unit.resname: G03·2 | Argothian Enchantress | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: G03·3 | Living Death | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Each player exiles all creature cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.
